description: There is nothing like a good vegan bean chili recipe on a cold day. It's the perfect comfort meal that will satisfy you like no other!
name: Vegan Bean Chili Recipe
recipeIngredient: 2 cups cubed butternut squash (can substitute any winter squash or even carrots)
1/4 cup white wine (or sub for broth)
5 cups veggie broth (, low sodium if needed)
2 tablespoons roasted almond butter (can sub sunflower seed butter or tahini for nut free)
1/2 -1 teaspoon sea salt (, adjust for preference)
1 cup cooked kidney beans (, drained and rinsed)
1 cup cooked black beans (, drained and rinsed)
1/2 -1 teaspoon cayenne pepper or chipotle powder for spice (, optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Saute the squash, onion, and garlic in white wine until the onion is soft and wine has reduced. About 2-3 minutes. Add to the crockpot if using the crockpot method.
Add in the rest of the ingredients except the cooked beans.
If using a crockpot, cook on high for 2 hours or on low for 4. When there is about 15-30 minutes left, add in the cooked beans.
If using the stovetop cook for 25 minutes over medium heat. Add in the cooked beans and cook another 5-10 minutes.
When done, mash a little to get a thicker texture and serve with toppings of choice!
